name: The Horde (itch) (Marco Camiolo)
description: The horde is a 2D game in a 3D environment. You play as a zombie attacking survivors to create a Horde.  It's about launching an attack at the best time to kill the survivor facing you.  If you launch an attack while you are under a rain of bullets, you lose instantly. If a Zombie in your horde dies, you lose.  Good Luck!!
